brand_info.name: Samsung
brand_info.positioning: Innovation-led global technology brand enabling connected, premium-feeling experiences across everyday life through an ecosystem of devices and services.
brand_info.vision: Inspire the World, Create the Future
brand_info.mission: Devote talent and technology to creating superior products and services that contribute to a better global society.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded on March 1, 1938 in Daegu, Korea by Lee Byung-chul as a trading company (Samsung Sanghoe); expanded into electronics with the establishment of Samsung Electronics in 1969, evolving into a global technology leader.

brand_values.brand_promise: Seamless, reliable technology that elevates everyday moments and helps people achieve more through intuitive experiences.

psychographics.lifestyle: Digitally fluent, progress-oriented, style-aware users who value convenience, creativity, and reliable performance in everyday routines.
psychographics.behavior: Chooses products that integrate well with daily life and other devices; responsive to clear benefit demonstrations and aspirational-yet-real contexts.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Benefit-first, clear and action-oriented with an empowering edge.
tone_dos: Anchor claims to visible use cases
tone_donts: Ambiguous metaphors that hide the benefit

logo.usage_rules: Keep high legibility; avoid busy backgrounds; do not distort, outline, or place on low-contrast areas.
logo.lockup_behavior: Top-left, top-right, or bottom alignment with consistent clear space; avoid competing with primary subject.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the 'S' in the wordmark

color_system.color_usage_rules: Use white or very light neutrals as dominant fields; Samsung Blue as anchor for brand recall; avoid heavy gradients and avoid overly saturated multi-color palettes.

layout_principles.grid_system: Modular grid with strong margins; flexible 8–12 column behavior across formats
layout_principles.cta_placement: Lower area, aligned to grid; never competing with hero content
layout_principles.alignment: Clean left alignment or centered hero with structured margins

style.camera_feel: Modern commercial clarity with controlled depth and crisp detail.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural, purposeful gestures that demonstrate use; expressions are calm to upbeat, never exaggerated.
style.casting_attitude: Inclusive, contemporary, style-aware; approachable confidence over theatricality.

technical.lighting: High-key daylight or clean studio softbox; controlled highlights on product surfaces
technical.contrast: Low to medium with clean blacks
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; product and hands/face in clear focus
technical.color_grading: Neutral to slightly cool; whites stay clean; skin tones natural

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Primary benefit visible through interaction; product remains readable and undistorted
product_presentation.styling_approach: Modern utilitarian wardrobe with subtle fashion cues; avoid loud branding and avoid costume styling

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts, subtle wipes, light parallax; avoid heavy effects

visual_dos: Keep product surfaces clean and true

interactive_elements: Large clean display walls with minimal UI

digital.tone_adjustment: More direct and benefit-led on web; more human and creator-led on social.

platform_behavior.Instagram: Short benefit stories, creator moments, clean overlays
platform_behavior.Website: Whitespace-driven pages, clear benefit sections, ecosystem storytelling
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Concise value proposition, clean modular blocks

print.cover_rules: Minimal headline, large hero visual, product truth, strong margins
